tgt_text: ngokulinganayo, kumele siqede ukungafani emiholweni yabesilisa nabesifazane, bese silandela isimiso somholo olinganayo oqukethwe kumthetho wokuqashwa ngokulingana.

src_text: re tshwanetse go phunyeletsa ka matsapa a rona a go fedisa mafega a banna, kgatelelo ya basadi le go tsholetsa banna go ba dira ditlhogo.
tgt_text: abesifazane kumele bavikelwe ekuhlukumezweni nasekubandlululweni endaweni yokusebenza.

src_text: ke maitsholo a mothale ono a a dirang gore basadi ba tshelele mo kgatelelong.
tgt_text: kusemahlombe abashayeli bezithuthi, abaphathi bamanyuvesi, ibhodi elilawula ukuphathwa kwesikole kanye nezinhlangano zezenkolo ukwenza izimo abesifazane namantombazane abazo hamba, bafunde futhi bakhonze kuzo bephephile.

src_text: go mo magetleng a rona – banna le basadi – go totobatsa gore boleng jwa mosadi, maemo a gagwe le maikutlo a gagwe ga a farologane ka gope le a monna ka ene.
tgt_text: kumele siphokophele phambili ngemizamo yethu yokuqeda ukuthi abesilisa bakhulu kunabesifazane, ukucwasana ngokobulili kanye nokunikeza amandla abesilisa.

src_text: go mo magetleng a rona re le batsadi le bonkoko le bontatemogolo go godisa bana ba rona ba basetsana le ba basimane ka go tshwana.
tgt_text: yiyo le ndlela yokucabanga edala ukucindezelwa kwabesifazane.

src_text: go mo magetleng a rona re le banna go gana nang ya banyana le go ema kgatlhanong le ditiragalo tsa gbv go sa kgathalesege gore re di bona di diriwa ke bo mang, le fa e le gore re tshwanetse go ema kgatlhanong le ditsala tsa rona, borre ba rona kgotsa bo abuti ba rona.
tgt_text: kusezandleni zethu – sonke abesilisa nabesifazane – ukugcizelela ukuthi ubugugu, isikhundla kanye nombono womuntu wesifazane awukho mncane kunalowo wowesilisa.

src_text: a re nneng setšhaba se mo botshelong jwa sone se tla fedisang dikgatelelo tsa methale yotlhe mo basadi.
tgt_text: kusezandleni zethu njengabazali kanye nogogo nomkhulu ukuphatha nokukhulisa amadodana namadodakazi ethu ngokufana.

src_text: setšhaba sa mo ngwageng wa 1956 se rebotse megwanto gore rona rotlhe re tshelele mo kgololesegong.
tgt_text: kusezandleni zethu madoda ukwala nokuphumela obala silwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile noma ikuphi lapho silubona, noma ngabe lwenziwa ngumngani wethu, obaba noma abafowethu.

src_text: re a ba kolota, re a ikolota e bile re kolota setšhaba sa mo nakong e e tlang gore re seke ra ikgatolosa tiro e e botlhokwa eno.
tgt_text: ake sibe isizukulwana esiqeda ukucindezelwa kwabesifazane ngezindlela zonke, esikhathini sethu sokuphila.

src_text: go keteka basadi ka go dira ikonomi
tgt_text: ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ngokubabandakanya kwezomnothongokubabandakanya kwezomnotho vukuzenzele unnamed ngoncwaba iningizi mu afrika ibungaza inyanga yabesifazane.

src_text: go boela tirong morago ga go itharabologelwa mo bolwetseng jwa covid19 allison cooper o k ka boela neng kwa tirong fa diteko di ribolotse gore o na lemogare wa corona (covid19)?
tgt_text: ukubuyela emsebenzini emva kokululama kwicovid19 allison cooper ungabuyela nini emsebenzini uma ngabe uke watholakala ukuthi wesuleleke ngegciwane lecorona (icovid19)?

src_text: setheo sa naga sa malwetse a a fetelanang se na le dikarabo ka ga seno.
tgt_text: isikhungo se zifo ezithathelanayo kuzwelonke sinezimpendulo ozidingayo.

src_text: fa ke sena go dira diteko mme di ribolotse gore ke na le covid19 , ke tshwanetse go nna sebaka se le kanakang ke itlhaotse mo bathong ba bangwe?
tgt_text: uma ngabe ngihlonzwa njengonecovid19 , kumele ngi hlale isikhathi esingakanani endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana?

src_text: batho ba go fitlhelwang ba na le covid19 morago ga go diriwa diteko, mme ba sena matshwao ape a yona, ba tshwanetse goitlhaola ba nne kwa magaeng a bona kgotsa kwa ditheong tsa puso tsa go itlhaola sebaka sa matsatsi a le 10, go tloga ka motsi o ba itsitseng ka dipholo tsa bona tsa diteko gore ba na le mogare ono.
tgt_text: abantu abahlonzwe njengabanecovid19 , kepha abangena zo izimpawu, kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana ekhaya noma esikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana sikahulumeni izinsuku eziyi10, ukusuka ngosuku othole ngalo imiphumela ethi unaleli gciwane.

src_text: batho bao ba nang le matshwao a a seng bogale ba tshwanetse go itlhaola mo bathong ba bangwe mme ba nne kwa magaeng a bona kgotsa kwa ditheong tsa puso tsa go itlhaola sebaka sa matsatsi a le 10, go tloga ka motsi o matshwao a bona a simolotseng go iponagatsa ka ona.
tgt_text: labo abanezimpawu ezincane kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana ekhaya noma esikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana sikahulumeni izinsuku eziyi10, uku suka ngosuku okwaqala ngalo izimpawu zaleli gciwane.

src_text: batho bao ba nang le matshwao a a bogale, bao ba tshwanetseng go ya kwa sepetlele, ba tshwanetse go nna mo mafelong a go itlhaola sebaka sa matsatsi a le 10, go tloga ka motsi o ba kokotletseng e bile ba sa tlhole ba tlhoka metšhini ya oksijene go ba thusa go hema.
tgt_text: labo abanezifo ezibucayi, okumele baye esibhedlela, kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana izinsuku eziyi10, ukusuka sebezizwa ngconywana futhi bengasayidingi ioksijini.

src_text: batho ba ba nang le covid19 ba ka tshwaetsa batho ba bangwe ka bolwetse jono jang?
tgt_text: abantu abanecovid19 bangasidlulisela kanjani lesi sifo kwabanye?

src_text: go ya ka tona ya boitekanelo zweli mkhize, batho ba le bantsi ba ba nang le matshwao a a seng bogale ba ka tshwaetsa ba bangwe ka mogare ono sebaka sa matsatsi a le supa go ya go a le 12. fa go le jalo, batho ba ba gateletsweng ke bolwetse jono bona ba ka bo gasa thata mme ba ka tshwaetsa batho ba bangwe ka mogare ono sebaka se se telele.
tgt_text: ngokuka ngqongqoshe wezempilo uzweli mkhize, abantu abaningi abanalokhu kugula okungabonakali bangalibhebhethekisa leli gciwane phakathi kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa kuya kweziyi12.

src_text: a ke tlhoka go dira diteko tse dingwe gape tsa covid19 , go netefatsa gore ga ke sa lwala, pele nka boela tirong?
tgt_text: noma kunjalo, abantu abagula kakhulu bangaba nobungozi obukhulu futhi bange sulela abanye ngaleli gciwane isikhathi eside.

src_text: nnyaa.
tgt_text: ngakube kufanele yini na ukuba ngiphinde ngihlolelwe icovid19 , ukufakazela ukuthi angi senalo leli gciwane, ngaphambi kokuba ngibuyele emsebenzini?

src_text: ga re eletse gore batho ba ba neng ba na le matshwao a a seng bogale a bolwetse jono mme ba alafegile go dira diteko lekgetlho la bobedi.
tgt_text: cha.

src_text: motho o tsewa gore o siametse go ka boela tirong le go tswa mo thulaganyong ya go itlhopha mo bathong ba bangwe fa a sa tlhole a na le twatsi e e fetelang batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: ukuphinda uhlole abantu abahlangabezana nokugula okungabonakali futhi asebeluleme akunconywa.

src_text: seno se raya gore ba tshwanetse ba bo ba iponetse matshwao a bona a ntlha a bolwetse jono matsatsi a le 10 a a fetileng mme ba setse ba na le sebaka sa matsatsi a ka nna a mararo ba sa itemogele matshwao ape.
tgt_text: umuntu uthathwa njengosephephile ukuba abuyele emsebenzini futhi angaphuma endaweni yokuhlala ngayedwana uma engeke esakwazi ukwesulela abanye ngaleli gciwane.

src_text: go le gantsi badiredi ba ka boela kwa ditirong tsa bona ntle le go dira diteko lekgetlo la bobedi.
tgt_text: lokhu kuchaza ukuthi baba nezimpawu zabo zokuqala ezinsukwini ezingaphezu kwezi10 ezedlule futhi abakabi nazimpawu okungenani izinsuku ezintathu.

src_text: fa ba weditse matsatsi a le 10 ba itlhaotse mo bathong ba bangwe.
tgt_text: ngokuvamile, abasebenzi banga buyela emsebenzini ngaphandle kokuhlola futhi uma: beqede izinsuku eziyi10 eziyimpoqo ukuthi uzihlale endaweni yokugonqa noma yokuhlala ngawedwana.

src_text: bao ba bontshitseng matshwao a a bogalenyana kgotsa a a bogale thata ba tshwanetse go isiwa bookelong.
tgt_text: labo ababenezimpawu ezimaphakathi noma lezo ezibucayi behlolwa kokwezempi lo.

src_text: ba tshwanetse go tswelela go itlhokomela ka go tlhapa le go katoga batho ba bangwe.
tgt_text: beqhubeka nokulandela imi khuba yenhlanzeko yomuntu kanye nokuziqhelelanisa kubantu.

src_text: mothapi o tshwanetse go ela tlhoko modiredi yono gore ga a boele mo bolwetseng jono.
tgt_text: umqashi egada umsebenzi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akaphindi asuleleke futhi.

src_text: ba apara dimaseke sebaka sa matsatsi a ka nna a le 21, go tloga ka motsi o diteko di ribolotseng gore ba a lwala.
tgt_text: begqoka izimfonyo, kusuka ngosuku lokuhlonzwa okungenani izinsuku ezingama21.

src_text: ke dirile diteko mme di ribolotse fa ke sa lwale mme ke santse ke itemogela matshwao a bolwetse.
tgt_text: ngihlolwe ngatholakala ngingenalo leli gciwane kephangisenezimpawu.

src_text: ke dira jang fa go le jaana?
tgt_text: kwenzakalani manje?

src_text: go a kgonagala gore dipholo tsa diteko di ka go aketsa.
tgt_text: kuyenzeka uthole imiphumela okungesiyo.

src_text: seno se raya gore dipholo tsa diteko tse o di dirileng lwantlha di ka re ga o lwale, fela mo tsamaong ya nako di ka tla di re o a lwala.
tgt_text: lokhu kungachaza ukuthi le miphumela yokuhlolwa kokuqala ingathi awunalo leli gciwane, kepha ungahlonzwa njengonalo leli gciwane ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.

src_text: fa e le gore o tswelela go itemogela matshwao a covid19 ikopanye le modiredi wa boitekanelo.
tgt_text: uma usaqhubeka uba nezimpawu zecovid19 kumele uthintane nezazi zezempilo.

src_text: go diragala eng fa e le gore ke santse ke itemogela matshwao ano fa morago ga sebaka sa matsatsi a le 10?
tgt_text: kwenzakalani uma ngisaqhubeka ngikhombisa izimpawu emvakwezinsuku eziyi10?

src_text: ke setlwaedi gore balwetse ba tswelele go nna le matshwao sebaka se se fetang matsatsi a le 10. go fola fodi fodi go tla diragala morago ga dibeke di le mmalwa.
tgt_text: kuvamile ukuba iziguli ziqhu beke nokuba nezimpawu ukwedlula izinsuku eziyi10.

src_text: fa e le gore o santse o na le matshwao ano, bona modiredi wa tsa boitekanelo go go naya kgakololo.
tgt_text: ukwelulama ngokuphelele kungathatha amaviki ambalwa.

src_text: go bona tshedimotsetso ka botlalo ka ga covid19 , etela webesaete ya setheo sa naga sa malwetse a a fetelanang mo go www.
tgt_text: uma ngabe usenezimpawu, thola iseluleko kumnakekeli wakho wezempilo.

src_text: nicd.
tgt_text: ngolwazi oluthe thuthu ngecovid19 , vakashela iwebhusayithi yesikhungo sezifo ezithathelanayo kuzwelonke ethi: www.

tgt_text: nicd.

tgt_text: ac.

src_text: datafree.
tgt_text: za, iwebhusayithi yecovid19 yamahhala ethi: coronavirus.

src_text: co, letsetsa nomoro ya mogala wa tshoganyetso wa covid19 mo go0800 029 999 kgotsa o romele molaetsa o o reng 'hi' ka whatsapp mo go0600 12 3456.
tgt_text: ukubuyela emsebenzini emva kokululama kwicovid19 allison cooper ungabuyela nini emsebenzini uma ngabe uke watholakala ukuthi wesuleleke ngegciwane lecorona (icovid19)?

src_text: tla re babalelaneng vukuzenzele unnamed naga ya rona e tsene mo kgatong ya bobedi ya go sa magana le leroborobo la mogare wa corona .
tgt_text: masigcinane siphephile vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu lehlele esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha ekulweni kwethu nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona .

src_text: seno se rotse boima jo maaforikaborwa otlhe a neng a bo rwele jwa go tshelela ka fa tlase ga dikiletso tse di boima mo matshelong a bona sebaka sa dikgwedi di le tlhano tse di fetileng.
tgt_text: lokhu kube njengokukhu luleka kubobonke abantu baseningizimu afrika abesebephila ngaphansi kwemikhawulo enzima izi nyanga eziyisihlanu eze dlule.

src_text: seno ke sesupo sa kgate lopele e re e dirang mo go fokotseng palo ya ditshwae tso tse dintšhwa le go fokotsa motlalo wa kwa dipetleleng.
tgt_text: kuluphawu lwenqubeke laphambili esiyenzayo uku nciphisa ukusuleleka okusha kanye nomthamo ezikhu ngweni zethu zezempilo.

src_text: e bile gape ke selo sa botlho kwa thata jaaka re leka go ka simolola sešwa ikonomi ya rona.
tgt_text: futhi kungukuthuthuka okubalulekile kakhulu njengoba siphokophelele ekuqaleni umnotho wethu kabusha.

src_text: fela go santse go le gale go ka keteka.
tgt_text: kodwake kusesekuseni kakhulu ukuthi singajabula.

src_text: re santse re le ka fa ganong la leroborobo le le setlhogo le le setseng ga jaana le komedi tse matshelo a maaforika borwa a feta a le 11 000 mo nageng ya aforika borwa ka nosi.
tgt_text: sisaphila phakathi kwalo mashayabhuqe wobhubhane osuthathe izimpilo zabantu abayizi11 000 eningizimu afrika kuphela nje.

src_text: le fa re na le palo e e fetang halofo ya milione ya batho ba go totobaditsweng fa ba tshwaetsegile, re santse re na le palo e e kwa godimo ya batho ba ba tshwaetsegi leng ka re le mo maemong a botlhano mo lefatsheng.
tgt_text: ezi gamekweni eziqinisekisiwe ezingaphezu kwesigamu sesigidi, sisahleli esibalweni sesihlanu samanani aphe zulu kakhulu okwesuleleka emhlabeni.

src_text: e bile go santse go na le kgona galo ya gore bolwetse jono bo ka ipoa sebedi.
tgt_text: futhi kuhlale kunethuba lokuphinde si bheduke isifo.

src_text: fa e le gore re tlhoka sega kolodi gore re ntshe matlho dinameng, ga re tlhoke go leba kae, re ka lebelela ditiragalo tsa sešweng mo nageng e e leng kgakala le rona ka dikhilomitara di le diketekete ya new zealand.
tgt_text: uma kwenzeka sidinga into ezosikhumbuza isidingo sokuthi siqaphelisise, kumele sibheke izigameko zaka muva ezenzeke endaweni engamakhilomitha ayizinku lungwane enew zealand.

src_text: morago fela ga dikgwedi di le tharo fa e sale go twe naga ga e sa na dikgetse tsa bao ba nang le mogare wa corona , naga eno ya new zealand e boetse mo dikgatong tsa go sekega nakwana ditiro tsa ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: ezinyangeni ezintathu emva kokumemezela izwe njenge lingasenalo igciwane lecorona, inew zealand isiphinde yaba ngaphansi kokuvalwa kwezwe.

src_text: le fa tota dikgetse tsa sešweng di le mmalwanyana fela, puso e tsere ka bonako dikgato tsa go busetsa tirisong gape di kgato tsa go sekega nakwana ditiro tsa ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: yize ukuqubuka kwegciwane kwakamuva kwaba nezigameko ezimba lwa, uhulumeni waphinde wabeka imikhawulo yoku valwa kwezwe ngokupha zima kweso.

src_text: dikiletso tsa mothale oo di ne tsa tshwanelwa ke go tse nngwa gape tirisong mo di kgaolong di le mmalwa tsa naga ya yuropa jaaka di ite mogela ditiragalo tsa go ipoa sebedi ga ditshwaetsego.
tgt_text: imikhawulo efanayo kumele ukuthi iphinde ibekwe ezingxenyeni ezini ngi zaseyurophu njengo ba bebhekane ‘nehlandla lesibili’ lokusuleleka.

src_text: maitemogelo ano a bo ntsha sentle fela ka fao dilo di kgonang go fetoga ka ponyo ya leitlho fa go tla mo go covid19 .
tgt_text: lezi zigameko zibonisa ukuthi izinto zingaguquka kanjani ngokuphazima nje kweso ngenxa yecovid19 .

src_text: tseno ke ditiragalo tse di dirang gore botlhe gareng ga rona bao re iphorang gore re gaufi le go furalela bothata jono jo bo setlhogo jwa malwetse a boitekanelo re itsotsorope.
tgt_text: kuyisixwayiso kunoma ngubani phakathi kwethu ongaphupha emini ukuthi selidumela emansumpeni ekuboneni isiphetho saloku kufa kwempilo yomphakathi ephuthumayo.

src_text: ee ke nnete gore go na le ditiragalo tse di dirang gore re nne le tsholofelo.
tgt_text: nomakanjani, ikhona inhla nsi yethemba elokozayo.

src_text: palo ya batho ba ba tshwaetsegileng e e rebolwang e tswelela go wela kwa tlase.
tgt_text: inani lezigameko ezintsha eziqinisekisiwe eningizimu afrika liyaqhubeka nokwe hla.

src_text: fa bolwetse jono bo ne bo simolola go gatelela mo kgwedinyaneng e e fetileng, re ne re rekota dikgetse tse dintšhwa di le 12 000 ka letsatsi tsa bao ba tshwaetsegileng.
tgt_text: esicongweni sesifo enya ngeni eyodwa eyedlule, inani lezigameko eziqinise kisiwe ezintsha beliyizi12 000 ngosuku.

src_text: palo eno e wetse kwa tlase mo re iphi tlhelang re rekota palo e e kanaka 5 000 ka letsatsi mo bekeng e e fetileng.
tgt_text: lokhu sekwe hle kwaya esilinganisweni esiphakathi esiyizi5 000 ngosuku evikini eledlule.

src_text: palo ya batho ba ba setseng ba itha rabologetswe mo bolwetseng jono e tsamaya mo go 80%.
tgt_text: izinga lethu lokululama lime kumaphesenti angama80.

src_text: jaaka naga e tsena mo mae mong a bobedi, dikiletso di le dintsi mo ditiragalong tsa loago le tsa ikonomi di fedi sitswe.
tgt_text: njengoba izwe lehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha, imikhawulo eminingi kwe zenhlalo nakwezomnotho isi susiwe.

src_text: mme ka kgato eno kgonagalo ya ditshwaetsego le yona e a tlhatloga.
tgt_text: lokhu kuza nobungo zi obukhulu bokusuleleka.

src_text: jaanong re tlhoka go me kamekana le matshosetsi ano le go netefatsa gore tsotlhe tse di molemo tse re di fitlhele tseng go fitlheng mo motsing ono mo go thibeleng gore leroborobo leno le aname ga e nne lefelafela.
tgt_text: manje sekumele silawule ubungozi futhi siqinisekise ukuthi esesikuzuzile kuze kube manje ekubambeze leni ukubhebhetheka kobhu bhane akubuyeli emuva.

src_text: leso legolo mo motsing ono fa go tla mo boitekanelong jwa setšhaba ke go goga dinao.
tgt_text: ubungozi obulengele impilo yesizwe njengamanje ukwe qiwa injabulo bese sikhohlwa ubungozi.

src_text: le fa tota jaanong re letleletswe go ka etela ditsala tsa rona le ba masika a rona, go etela mafe lo a boitapoloso, go tsaya maeto a go tlhaba kgobe ka mmutla le go ka nwa bojalwa kwa direstšurenteng, kwa dibareng le kwa dithabeneng.
tgt_text: kungenzeka ukuthi manje sesivumelekile ukuhlangana nabangani nomndeni, ukuvakashela izindawo zokuzijabulisa, ukuthatha uhambo kuyonce belekwa nokuphuza utshwa la ezindaweni zokudlela, ezindaweni zokuphuzela utshwala nasemathaveni.

src_text: jaaka leele la bogolotala le tlhalosa, ka ntlha ya gore o neetswe tetla ya go dira jalo, ga go raye gore o tshwanetse go dira jalo.
tgt_text: kodwa njengesisho saku dala esithi, ukuthi unga kwazi ukwenza into, lokho akusho ukuthi kumele uye nze.

src_text: batho ba le bantsi ba ba nang le mogare wa corona ga ba na matshwao ape e bile le bona ba ka tswa ba sa itse gore ba tshwaetsegile.
tgt_text: abantu abaningi abahaqwe igciwane lecorona abanazo izimpawu futhi kungenzeka bangazi nakwazi ukuthi ba sulelekile.

src_text: eno ke nnete e e senang tshutiso e e dirang gore o ipatle o ipa tlisise gonne e raya gore yo mongwe le yo mongwe mo go rona a ka tswa a tshwae tsegile gona jaanong e bile a ka tshwaetsa ba bangwe e se maikaelelo a gagwe.
tgt_text: leli iqiniso eli hlasimulisa umzimba ngoba lokhu kusho ukuthi noma ngubani kithina kungenzeka usulelekile njengamanje futhi kungenzeka usulele abanye ngokungenhloso.

src_text: seno se ka diragala bogolo fa motho a etela balosika, bogolo jang ba ba tsofetseng le ba ba nang le malwetse a a sa foleng a a ba dirang gore ba nne mo kotsing e e kwa godimo ya go ka tshwaetsega.
tgt_text: kuzoba njalo uma ku vakashelwa izihlobo, ikakhu lukazi abantu asebekhulile kanye nalabo abanezifo ezi ngamahlalakhona ezibenza babe buthakathaka ekwe sulelekeni.

src_text: go fela jalo le fa o ya meletlong ya sedumedi kgotsa ya setso.
tgt_text: futhi kuliqiniso uma kuthanyelwa izinkonzo noma imicimbi yamasiko.

src_text: leru le le wetseng dinaga tse dingwe tse dintsinyana la go tshwaetsega lekgetlo la bobedi ke kotsi e le rona go nang le kgonagalo ya gore e ka re wela.
tgt_text: ‘ihlandla lesibili’ lokwe suleleka amanye amazwe amaningi abhekene nalo into ehlezi ingenzeka na kuthina.

src_text: le fa tota dikiletso di le dintsi di tlosi tswe, ga go raye gore ga di kitla di busediwa tirisong fa re ka itemogela tlhatlogo e e namagadi ya ditshwaetsego.
tgt_text: yize imikhawulo eminingi seyisusiwe, lokhu akusho ukuthi ngeke iphinde ibuyiswe uma kungenzeka sibhekane nokukhuphuka kokusuleleka.

src_text: leroborobo leno le tsho setsa tota matshelo a rona.
tgt_text: lolu bhu bhane luyisimo sokufa noku phila.

src_text: re tlhoka go fetola ka fao re tshelang ka teng le go ntsha matlho dinameng.
tgt_text: kumele sivumelane nesimo futhi sidinga ukuthi siqaphelisise.

src_text: mo matsatsing a a tlang, dibekeng tse di tlang le dikgweding tse di tlang re tshwanetse go tsepamisa mogopolo wa rona mo ma tsholong a itharabologelo.
tgt_text: ezinsukwini, emavikini nasezinyangeni ezizayo, kumele ngokuphuthumayo sibhekane nemizamo yethu yokululama.

src_text: ikonomi ya rona mmogo le setšhaba sa rona di bogile tota.
tgt_text: umnotho wethu nomphakathi wethu bakhahlamezeke kakhulu.

src_text: fela jaaka re busetsa sekeng ditiragalo tsa ikono mi go ralala le diintaseteri tse di batlang e ka nna tsotlhe – le go samagana le go baaka nyana le ditshenyegelo tse di nnileng teng – re na le mai karabelo a go netefatsa gore yo mongwe le yo mongwe wa rona e ka tswa e le batho ka bo bona, bathapi, baagi, bamalapa, baporofeshenale, badiri le baagi ga a goge maoto.
tgt_text: njengoba sesibuyela emse benzini cishe kuzozonke izimboni – futhi sisebenza ukulungisa umonakalo owenzekile – sinesibophe zelo sokungayekeli uku hlale siqaphile njengomunye nomunye, njengabaqashi, njengomphakathi, njenge mindeni, njengochwephe she, njengabasebenzi kanye nezakhamuzi.

src_text: ga go ope gareng ga rona yo a batlang go boela mo matsatsing a fa re ne re si molola go tseno mo dikga tokiletsong tsa go sekega nakwana ditiro tsa ka fa na geng.
tgt_text: akekho kuthina ofuna ukubuyela ezinsukwini ezi dlule zemikhawulo eqinile yokuvalwa kwezwe.

src_text: re batla go gatelapele ka matshelo a rona.
tgt_text: sifuna ukuqhubeka nezimpilo zethu.

src_text: re batla gore ditsala tsa rona le bao re tshelang le bona ba nne ba ntse ba itekanetse e bile ba babalesegile.
tgt_text: sifuna abangani bethu nabathandiweyo bethu bahlale benempilo futhi be phephile.

src_text: re le setšhaba, tla re nete fatseng gore re tswelela go dirisana mmogo go netefatsa gore re nna le kgatelopele.
tgt_text: njengesizwe, asiqhubeke sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi siqhubekela phambili.

src_text: go tseneng mo kgatong ya bobedi ga go raye gore jaanong re kwa 'mme ga a mpone.'
tgt_text: ukwehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuvalwa kwezwe akuyona nje ‘inkululeko kawonkewonke.’ imithetho yokuqhelelana, ukugqokwa kwezifonyo, imibuthano yomphakathi kanye noku vakashela amanye amazwe isamile.

src_text: melao e e laolang gore re se atamelane, re apare dimaseke, melao e e mabapi le go kgobokana le ya go tsaya maeto go etela dinaga tse dingwe e santse e le mo tirisong.
tgt_text: impumelelo yethu ilele ekuthobeleni kwethu le mithethonqubo futhi noku qinisekisa ukuthi omunye nomunye uziphatha ngoku zinakekela nangokuzibo phezela.

src_text: gore re atlege re tlhoka go obamela melawanataolo eno le go netefatsa gore botlhe ba rona re itshwara sentle le go nna le maikarabelo.
tgt_text: ngaso sonke isikhathi uma sicabanga nanoma isiphi isenzo esingabalulekile, kumele sibuze ukuthi: ibu phi ubungozi bokusuleleka kuthina nakwabanye?

src_text: nako le nako fa re tlhoka go dira tiro nngwe fela e e seng botlhokwa, re tlhoka go ipotsa gore: a go na le kgona galo ya gore tiro eno e ka dira gore ke iphitlhele ke tshwae tsegile kgotsa ke tshwaeditse batho ba bangwe naa?
tgt_text: lapho kukhona khona ubungozi, noma ngabe buncane kanga kanani, kungcono ninga kwenzi.

src_text: fa e le gore go na le kgonagalo e kgolo ya seno, le fa tota e le e e potlana, go botoka gore o itunne o seke wa e diragatsa.
tgt_text: asiphokophele phambili, njengakuqala, ngokuqa phela.

src_text: tla re kakatleleng fela jalo, ka go ntsha matlho dina meng.
tgt_text: masigcinane siphephile vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu lehlele esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha ekulweni kwethu nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona .

src_text: sireletsa basadi le bana ba rona vukuzenzele unnamed ngwaga o o fetileleng, mo letsatsing la gompieno, diketekete tsa basadi, banna le bana di ne tsa gwantela kwa palamenteng go ipelaetsa kgatlhanong le ditiragalo tsa dipetelelo le dipolao tsa basadi le basetsanyana.
tgt_text: masivikele abesifazane nabantwana bethu vukuzenzele unnamed onyakeni owedlule, osukwini oluseduze nje, izinku lungwane zabesifazane, amadoda kanye nabantwana bamashela ephalamende ukuyobhikishela ukulwisana nesihlava sokudlwengulwa kanye nokubulawa kwabesifazane namantombazane.

src_text: mo nakong eo, naga ya rona e ne e santse e le mo kutlobotlhokong ya go bolawa ga uyinene mrwetyana, leighandre jegels, jesse hess mmogo le basadi ba bangwe ba le bantsi ba ba latlhegetsweng ke matshelo a bona ba bolawa ke banna ba ba setlhogo.
tgt_text: ngaleso sikhathi, isizwe sasi sakhungathwe ukubulawa kukauyinene mrwetyana, uleighandre jegels, ujesse hess kanye nabanye abesifazane abaningi abalahlekelwa izimpilo zabo ngezandla zamadoda anesihluku.

src_text: badiraditshupetso bano botlhe ba ba neng ba dira ditshupetso ka mowa o o edileng, ba ba nang le maemo a a farologaneng mo setšhabeng, ba ba potlana le ba bagolo, baithuti le basadi ba ba dirang, ba ne ba tsholeditse dipolakata tse di neng di kwadilwe melaetsa e e reng ‘enough is enough ’ le e e reng ‘am i next?
tgt_text: kusuka kuyoyonke indawo, omnca ne nomdala, abafundi nabesifazane abasebenzayo, ababhikishi ababebhikisha ngokuthula babephakamise izingqwembe ezazibhalwe ukuthi 'enough is enough ' nokuthi ' am i next?'.
usizi nentukuthelo kwakubhalwe emehlweni ngalolo suku.

src_text: mo motsing oo badiraditshupetso ba ne ba fegetswe tota.
tgt_text: ngesikhathi ngamukela izimfuno zabo ezazibekwe zacaca bha, kwacaca kumina ukuthi kudingeka sisukume ngokushesha futhi nangokuzimisela.

src_text: fa ke ne ke amogela tokomane ya ditlhokwa tsa bona tse di neng di tlhalositswe ka tlhamalalo, go ne tota go tlhamaletse gore re tlhoka go tsaya dikgato ka ponyo ya leitlho le ka matlhagatlhaga.
tgt_text: kwakubalulekile kumina ukuthi ngingaphenduli ngamagama ayize leze futhi nangezithembiso zamanga.

src_text: go ne go le botlhokwa mo go nna gore fa ke tsibogela ditlhokwa tsa bona ke se dire jalo ka go ba solofetsa lefelafela le go dirisa mafoko a a sa reng sepe.
tgt_text: ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezalandela, ngabiza umhlangano wokuhlala ngokuhlanganyela kwezindlu zombili zephalamende, lapho samemezela isamba esingur1.6 wesigidigidi sohlelo lwezinyathelo eziphuthumayo zokulwisananodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane (igbvf).

src_text: mo matsatsing a le mmalwa morago ga seno, ke ne ka kopa kopanotshwaraganelong ya palamente, mo re neng ra tsibosa fa re tla tlhoka bokanaka r1.6 bilione ya leanotiro la tsibogelo ya ditiragalo tsa tshoganyetso e e tla dirisediwang go lwantshana le tirisodikgoka e e totileng batho ba bong jo bo rileng le dipolao tsa basadi (gbvf).
tgt_text: ezinyangeni eziyisithupha selokhu sethulwa, ukusetshenziswa kwemali eminyangweni ehlukene kahulumeni kwabuye kwahlelwa kwabusha ngokubeka phambili ukunakekelwa nokwesekwa kwabasindile, ukuqwashisa kanye nemikhankaso yoku vikela, ukwenza ngcono imithetho nezinqubomigomo, ukuthuthukisa ukwesekwa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho, kanye nokuqinisa uhlelo lobulungiswa kwezobugebengu.

src_text: mo dikgweding di le thataro tse di fetileng tsa go tsenngwatirisong, tiriso ya madi a puso mo mafapheng a puso a a farologaneng e ne ya retololwa go tshegetsa dikgato tsa tlhokomelo le tshegetso ya batswasetlhabelo, tsa matsholo a thibelaketegelo mmogo le matsholotemoso, go tlhabolola melao le dipholisi, go tsholetsa matlafatso ya basadi go ikemela mo mererong ya ikonomi, mmogo le go matlafatsa tsamaiso ya tirelo ya bosiamisi.
tgt_text: futhi njengamanje sisesikhathini lapho ingalo ende yomthetho isiguqulwe kabusha ukuze kuliwe negbvf .

src_text: mme ga jaanong re fa gare mo dikgatong tsa rona tsa go fetola molao mo go lwantshaneng le gbvf.
tgt_text: imithethosivivinywa emithathu ebalulekile ehlobene negbvf yethulwe ephalamende muva nje.

src_text: go melaotlhomo e e botlhokwa e le meraro e e amanang le tirisodikgoka e e totileng batho ba bong jo bo rileng (gbv) e e rometsweng kwa palamenteng mo malobeng.
tgt_text: ngokwethulwa kwale mithethosivivinywa, sigcina isethembiso esasenza kubabhikishi ngonyaka odlule nakubobonke abesifazane bakuleli lizwe.

src_text: ka go tsenya tirisong melaotlhomo eno, re tla bo re diragatsa seo re se solofeditseng badiraditshupetso ba mo mogwantong wa mo ngwageng o o fetileng mmogo le basadi botlhe ba naga ya rona.
tgt_text: imithethosivivinywa echitshiyelwe emithathu yenzelwe ukuvala igebe elivumela izaphulamthetho ukubalekela ubulungiswa futhi inika ngokugcwele abesifazane nabantwana bezwe lethu amalungelo.

src_text: melaotlhomo e meraro eno e e kwalolotsweng sešwa maitlhomo a yona ke go thiba diphatlha tse di leng teng ga jaana tse di kgontshang ditlhokotsebe tsa bosenyi jono go tshabela go atlholwa ka tshwanelo mmogo le go dira gore ditshwanelo tsa basadi le bana ba ka fa nageng ya rona di nne le mosola.
tgt_text: le mithethosivivinywa, uma isiphasisiwe yaba imithetho, izosiza ukubuyisa ukuzethemba kwabesifazane bezwe lethu njengoba umthetho ukhona ukuze ubavikele.

src_text: melaotlhomo eno, fa go setse go feditswe ka yona go ka sekasekiwa, e tla thusa gore basadi mo nageng ya rona ba boelwe ke tshepo gore tota molao o teng e bile o a ba sireletsa.
tgt_text: owokuqala umthethosivivinywa ochibiyela umthetho wokuchibiyela wamacala ezobugebengu (amacala ezocansi nahambisana nawo).

src_text: ya ntlha molaotlhomo ono o tla kwalola sešwa molao wa bosenyi (ditlolo tsa molao wa thobalano le melato ya mothale ono) molao o o kwalolotsweng sešwa.
tgt_text: lokhu kwethula amacala amasha okusatshiswa ngokocansi, amacala okulalana kwezihlobo, kanye nomsebenzi wabantu wokubika uma besola ukuthi kukhona ukuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi okwenzekile emntwaneni.

src_text: ona o tlhagisa dikgato tse dingwe tse dintšhwa tse di tsewang e le ditlolomolao tsa go bogisa ka thobalano, o atolosa melato eno go tsenyeletsa le e e diriwang le mo bathong bao le amanang ka tshika, mmogo le go atolosa maikarabelo a go bula dikgetse tsa thobalano go tsenyeletsa go letlelela le batho ba ba belaelang fa bana ba bogisiwa ka ditiragalo tsa thobalano.
tgt_text: iphinde yelula ukuthi irejista kazwelonke yamacala ezocansi (inrso) ifake lonke uhla lwabaphulimthetho kwezocansi.

src_text: o atolosa tiro ya rejisetara ya naga ya batho ba go fitlhetsweng ba le molato mo ditatofatsong tsa thobalano (nrso) gore mo go yona go kwalwe dintlha tsa botlhe ba go fitlhetsweng ba le molato mo ditatofatsong tsa thobalano.
tgt_text: kuze kube manje, isafake kuphela abaphulimthetho kwezocansi abalahlwe ngamacala ezocansi kubantwana noma kubantu abaphila nokukhubazeka ngokwengqondo.

src_text: go fitlheng mo motsing ono, dintlha tse di neng di tlhagisiwa mo rejisetareng eno e ntse e le fela tsa batho bao go fitlhetsweng ba le molato mo ditatofatsong tsa thobalano tseo di amang bana kgotsa batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi mo tlhaloganyong.
tgt_text: isikhathi sokugcinwa kohla lwesaphulimthetho sikhushuliwe, futhi labo abafakwe kurejista kuzomele bakudalule lokho uma befaka izicelo zokusebenza nabantu ababuthakathaka.

src_text: sebaka seo dintlha tsa bao go fitlhetsweng ba le molato mo ditatofatsong tsa thobalano di ka gatisiswang mo rejisetareng eno se okeditswe, mme bao ba tlhagelelang mo rejisetareng eno ba tla tshwanelwa ke go tlhagisa ntlha eno fa ba dira dikopo tsa diphatlhatiro mo ba tla bong ba dira le batho ba ba leng mo tlalelong.
tgt_text: umthethosivivinywauphinde uhlinzekele ukuthi amagama abantu akunrso umphakathi uyakwazi ukuwathola.

src_text: molaotlhomo ono o dira gape gore bao maina a bona a tlhagelelang mo go nrso setšhaba se a fitlhelele bonolo.
tgt_text: isichibiyelo somthethosivivinywa wamacala obugebengu kanye nahambisana nawo sizoqinisa, phakathi kokunye, ukunikezwa kwebheyili kwezaphulamthetho zegbvf , futhi sichaze kabanzi ngamacala azothola izigwebo ezincane.

src_text: molaotlhomo o o kwalolotswe sešwa wa bosenyi le melato ya mothale ono o gagamatsa, gareng ga tse dingwe, go rebolela ditlhokotsebe tsa gbvf beile, mmogo le go atolosa paka ya katlholelo kwa kgolegong mo paka e khutshwane ya eno e tla nnang segapeletsa.
tgt_text: izichibiyelo zibeka izibopho ezintsha phezu kwezikhulu zomthetho kanye nezinkantolo zethu.

src_text: dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di gapeletsa gore batlhankedi ba ditheo tsa go disa kobamelomo lao mmogo le dikgotlatshekelo tsa rona di nne le maikano a mantšhwa.
tgt_text: uma umshushisi engasiphikisi isicelo sebheyili emacaleni egbv , kumele abhale izizathu zakhe phansi.

src_text: fa motšhotšhisi a sa ganetse beile mo dikgetseng tsa gbv , o tshwanetse go tsenya mabaka a go dira jalo mo rekotong.
tgt_text: ngaphandle uma umsolwa wecala legbv angabeka izimo ezinqala ukuthi kungani kumele akhululwe ngebheyili, inkantolo kumele inqume ukuthi bavalelwe kuze kuphele ukuthethwa kwecala.

src_text: ntle le fa e le gore motho yo a latofadiwang ka gbv a ka neela mabaka a a utlwagalang gore goreng a tlhoka go gololwa ka beile, kgotlatshekelo e tshwanetse go laola gore motho yoo a golegwe go fitlha dikgato tsa molao di konosediwa.
tgt_text: ekuthatheni isinqumo esicelweni sebheyili, izinkantolo ziphoqelekile ukucabangisisa ngezinto eziningi.

src_text: pele go ka tsewa ditshwetso mabapi le dikopo tsa dibaile, dikgotlatshekelo di tshwanetse go sekaseka mabaka a le mantsinyana.
tgt_text: okubandakanya imibiko yaphambi kokuthethwa kwecala, ukwesatshiswa okunodlame kosindile, kanye nombono wosindile mayelana nokuphepha kwakhe.

src_text: ona a akaretsa dipegelo tsa pele go lebiwa kwa kgotlatshekelo mabapi le kgonagalo ya go golola molatofadiwa ka beile, ditiragalo tsa go tshosetsa motswasetlhabelo ka tirisodikgoka, mmogo le maikutlo a motswasetlhabelo fa go tla mo pabalesegong ya gagwe.
tgt_text: mayelana noshwele, ummangali noma isihlobo sesisulu esashona kumele bakwazi ukuyozimela kwibhodi likashwele.

src_text: fa go tla mo go reboleng parola, mongongoregi kgotsa wa losika la moswi yo e leng motswasetlhabelo o tshwanetse go nna teng jaaka kemedi mo botong e e rebolang parola.
tgt_text: ngokubuka amazinga angamukeleki neze odlame kubalingani abasebudlelwaneni ezweni lethu, sesiqinise ukuhlinzekwa komthetho wodlame lwasekhaya.

src_text: ka ntlha ya ditiragalo tse di kwa godimo tsa ka fa nageng tsa tirisodikgoka mo bathong ba ba ratanang, re gagamaditse dikarolo tsa molao wa thibelo ya tirisodikgoka magareng ga batho ba ba leng mo kgolaganong ya lorato.
tgt_text: udlame lwasekhaya manje seluchazwa ukuze luvikele labo abathembisene umshado, abajolayo, ubudlelwano bamasiko, abathandanayo, ubudlelwano bocansi osebuqhubeke noma isikhathi esingakanani.

src_text: tirisodikgoka magareng ga batho ba ba leng mo kgolaganong ya lorato jaanong e tlhalosiwa gore jaanong e tsenyeletsa le batho ba ba tshepisaneng lenyalo, ba ba ntshanang, ba ba leng mo manyalong a setso, le ba ba ratanang kgotsa ba ba leng mo kgolaganong ya lerato le le tukang malakabe, ba ba utlwanang kgotsa ba utlwanetse tsa thobalano go sa kgathalesege gore ke sebaka se se kanakang ba le mo kgolaganong eno.
tgt_text: umthethosivivinywauphinde welule ukuchazwa'kodlame lwasekhaya' ukuze ufake ukuvikelwa kwabantu abadala ekuhlukunyezweni ngamalungu omndeni.

src_text: molaotlhomo ono gape o tlhalosa gape le gore ‘tirisodikgoka magareng ga batho ba ba leng mo kgolaganong ya lorato’ e tsenyeletsa gape le batho ba ba tsofetseng bao ba bogisiwang ke ditokololo tsa malapa.
tgt_text: abamangali bazokwazi ukufaka izicelo zomyalo wokuvikelwa ngeinthanethi.

src_text: bangongoregi ba tla kgona go dira kopo ya lekwalo la semolao la go thibela motho yo a go bogisang go se tlhole a go atumela ba dira jalo ka inthanete.
tgt_text: ukugwema isimo lapho izaphulamthetho zingafihla imilando yodlame lwasekhaya, kuzosungulwa inqolobane yemiyalo yokuvikelwa.

src_text: go thiba diphatlha tse di kgontshang ditlhokotsebe go fitlha ditiro tsa bona tse di leswe tsa go gesela baokapelo ba bona, go tla tlhomiwa sefalana se se golagantsweng sa makwalo ano otlhe a a rebotsweng kgatlhanong le setlhokotsebe.
tgt_text: izichibiyelo ezethuliwe ziphinde ziphoqe iminyango yokuthuthukiswa komphakathi, owemfundo eyisisekelo, owemfundo ephakeme kanye nowezempilo ukuthi ihlinzeke ngezinsiza ezithile kwabasindile uma kudingeka nokubathumela ukuze bathole ukukhosela nokunakekelwa kokwelashwa.

src_text: dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di rwesa gape le lefapha la tlhabololo ya loago, lefapha la thuto ya motheo, lefapha la thuto e kgolwane mmogo le lefapha la boitekanelo maikarabelo a go tlamela batswasetlha ka ditirelo tsa mothale o o rileng foo di tlhokegang mmogo le go ba romela kwa ditheong tse ditlhokomelang batswasetlhabelo mmogo le kwa maokelong.
tgt_text: izimo lapho umshushisi anganqaba ukushushisa uma amacala enziwe ngaphansi komthetho ochitshiyelwe noma ukusula icala uma kufaka phakathi ukulimala noma lapho kukhona isikhali esasetshenziswa ukusabisa ummangali.

src_text: mabaka a motšhotšhisi a ka ganang go tšhotšhisa setlhokotsebe ka ona fa se dirile melato go ya ka dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa molao ono kgotsa a go busetsa morago kgetse fa e tsamaelana le go gobatsa motho mo mmeleng kgotsa a amana le tiriso ya sebetsa go tshosetsa mongongoregi a fokoditswe.
tgt_text: uma mhlawumbe ukuchitshiyelwa okuqinile okwethuliwe komthetho, uma umuntu othile enolwazi,ekholelwa noma enezinsolo zokuthi isenzo sodlame lwasekhaya lwenzekile emntwaneni, kumuntu ophila nokukhubazeka noma kumuntu omdala futhi ahluleke ukubika kusonhlalakahle noma ephoyiseni angahlawuliswa noma aboshwe.

src_text: mo go tse dingwe tsa dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tse di botlhokwa thata mo molaong ono, ke karolo e e reng fa go na le motho yo a nang le kitso, a dumela kgotsa a belaela gore go na le ngwana, motho yo a tshelang ka bogolofadi kgotsa motho yo a tsofetseng yo a bogisiwang ka pogiso ya tirisodikgoka magareng ga batho ba ba leng mo kgolaganong ya lorato mme a nna kgang eno ka marago a sa begele motlhankedi wa loago kgotsa tirelo ya sepodisi sa aforika borwa (saps) motho yoo a ka tlhaodisiwa kgotsa a tswalelwa kwa kgolegelong.
tgt_text: ngokufanayo, ukuhluleka kwelungu lesaps ukulandela isibopho ngaphansi komthetho kuzothathwa njengokuphula umthetho futhi kumele libikwe kumabhalane wophiko lwamaphoyisa.

src_text: go fela jalo le ka lepodisi la saps le le sa ikamanyeng le maikarabelo a lona a molao ono ka maitsholo ao a tla tsewa e le a a sa amogelegeng mme a ka begiwa kwa lephateng la mokwaledi wa baagi mabapi le ditirelo tsa sepodisi.
tgt_text: umthetho ungumvikeli wokuqala womphakathi, kodwa ikakhulukazi labo ababuthakathaka.

src_text: molao ke konokono e go ka ikanngwang yona fa go tla mo tshireletsong ya baagi, bogolo jang bao ba leng mo tlalelong.
tgt_text: uma senza ngokukhuthala nangokulunga, lokho ikona okuqinisekisa amandla obulungiswa.

src_text: fa o dirisiwa ka manontlhotlho le ka go se tseye letlhakore, ke modiredi yo o boikanyego wa bosiamisi.
tgt_text: abesifazane baseningizimu afrika sebekhathele izinyathelo ezingayi ndawo ezingaxazululi ngisho nelu ngelo elibaluleke kakhulu kunawo wonke ukuphila ngokukhululeka ngaphandle kokwesaba.

src_text: basadi ba naga ya aforika borwa ba nkgetswe ke dikgato tse di yang di boa tse di sa diragatseng e nngwe ya ditshwanelo tse di botlhokwa go gaisa – go tshela mo kgololesegong ntle le go boifa sepe.
tgt_text: lo hulumeni nabambisene nabo bazobenzela kahle abesifazane baseningizimu afrika.

src_text: puso e re leng mo go yona eno mmogo le badirisanimmogo ba yona e tla tswela basadi ba naga ya aforika borwa molemo.
tgt_text: masivikele abesifazane nabantwana bethu vukuzenzele unnamed onyakeni owedlule, osukwini oluseduze nje, izinku lungwane zabesifazane, amadoda kanye nabantwana bamashela ephalamende ukuyobhikishela ukulwisana nesihlava sokudlwengulwa kanye nokubulawa kwabesifazane namantombazane.

src_text: woza matrics e thankgolotswe dale hes maitlhomo a letsholo la woza matrics ke go thusa baithuti botlhe ba mophato wa bo 12 gore ba kgone go falola ditlhatlhobo tsa bona tsa bokhutlo jwa ngwaga.
tgt_text: kwethulwe ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lwewoza matrics dale hes uhlelo lwewoza matrics kuhloswe ngalo ukusiza bonke abafundi bebanga lesi12 ukuthi bakwazi ukuphumelela izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka.

src_text: barutwana ba materiki ba monongwaga ba tobane le dikgwetlho tse di seng kana ka sepe ka ntlha ya mogare wa corona (covid19).
tgt_text: abafundi bakama tikuletsheni bakulonyaka kumele babhekane nezingqinamba eziningi ngenxa yesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) .

src_text: lefapha la thuto ya motheo le netefaditse gore go bulwa sešwa ga dikolo ka tsela e e babalesegileng ke sengwe sa tse dingwe tse di leng kwa selthoeng, mmogo le go tshegetsa barutwana ka matsholo a a farologaneng go ba thusa gore ba atlege mo go konosetseng dithuto tsa bona tsa monongwaga.
tgt_text: umnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo (idbe) ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuvulwa kabusha kwezikole ngendlela ephephile kungenye yezinto eziseqhulwini, ngokuhambisana nezinhlelo ezehlukene zokweseka abafundi ukuze basizakale ekutheni baqede ngempumelelo lo nyaka wokufunda.

src_text: le lengwe la matsholo ano ke lenaane la woza matrics , le le thankgolotsweng ka la bo01 lwetse 2020 ka tirisanommogo le badirisanimmogo ba le bantsinyana ba kgaso mmogo le baitseanape ba thuto.
tgt_text: olunye lwezinhlelo uhlelo lwewoza matrics , olwethulwa ngokusemthethweni mhla lulu1 kumandulo ngokusebenzisana nabahlanganyeli bezokusa kaza abaningi kanye nongcweti bezemfundo.

src_text: jaaka karolo ya lenaane leno, go gasiwa dirutwana di le thataro tse di botlhokwa tsa materiki mo dikanaleng tsa sabc, dstv le openview (channel 122) letsatsi le letsatsi sebaka sa dibeke di le 12 go tloga ka ura ya borobedi mo mosong go fitlha ka ura ya bo lesome mo mosong e bo e tshameka gape go tloga ka ura ya bongwe mo motshegareng go fitlha ka ura ya boraro mo motshegareng go thusa barutwana go se salele morago.
tgt_text: njengengxenye yohlelo, ukufundwa kwezifundo ezisilele emuva ezifundweni eziyisithupha nokuyizo eziyisisekelo kuzosakazwa emoyeni nsuku zonke isikhathi esingangamaviki ayi12 ez inkundleni zokusakaza isabc, idstv kanye nakuopenview (kwishaneli 122) , kusuka ngehora lesi8 kuya kwihora lesi10 ekuseni kuphinde kuqhubeke futhi ngehora loku1 kuya ngehora lesi3 ntambama.

src_text: maitlhomo a lona ke go thusa barutwana gore ba kgone go ka ipaakanyetsa ditlhatlhobo tsa bona tsa bofelo jwa ngwaga.
tgt_text: inhloso ukusiza abafundi balungiselele izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka.

src_text: serala seno gape se na le mananeo a dirutwa a a diragalang ka ona motsotso oo, moo barutwana ba ka kgonang go botsa barutabana dipotso mo ba sa tlhaloganyeng.
tgt_text: lesi sizindalwazi sohlelo siphinde sihlinzeke ngezifundo bukhoma, laphoke abafundi bezokwazi khona ukuba nethuba lokubuza imibuzo kothisha.

src_text: go na gape le dikeletso mabapi le tseo barutwana ba tshwanetseng go di tlhokomela mo ditlhatlhobong tsa bona.
tgt_text: sizophinde sihlinzeke ngamasu azosiza abafundi.

src_text: woza matrics e a itse gore le fa tota e le barutwana botlhe ba ba reteletsweng ke go tsena sekolo ka tshwanelo, barutwana ba mophato wa bo 12 ke bona ba ba amegileng bobe go gaisa, ka ntlha ya fa dipholo tsa bona di le botlhokwa thata mo go ba kgontsheng go ka bona ditiro le mo go amogelweng kwa yunibesiti.
tgt_text: iwoza matrics iye yakubona ukuthi ngesikhathi bonke abafundi belahlekelwe isikhathi sokufunda, ibanga lesi12 lona likhahlamezeke ngokudlulele, njengoba amamaki abo ebaluleke kakhulu kulokho abafisa ukuba yikho kusasa kanye nokuthi izicelo zabo zokufunda enyuvesi zamukelwe.

src_text: tona ya thuto ya motheo mme angie motshekga a re lenaane leno le botlhokwa thata bogolojang ka ntlha ya fa dithuto di kgoreleditswe ke covid19 .
tgt_text: ungqongqoshe wemfundo eyisisekelo uangie motshekga uthi lolu hlelo lubaluleke kakhulu, ikakhulukazi uma ubheka umonakalo omkhulu odalwe yicovid19 .

src_text: "materiki ka gale o na le ka fao o gatelelang maikutlo ka teng, fela ngwaga wa 2020 one o tlile ka kgatelelo ya maikutlo e e neng e sa solofelwa.
tgt_text: "umatikuletsheni uhlezi uza nobunzima, kodwa unyaka wezi2020 ubugcwele ubunzima obungajwayelekile.

src_text: ke rata go kaakgola bathuti botlhe ba mophato wa bo 12 mmogo le ba malapa a bona ka go ikatlapela le go nna le maikemisetso jaaka ba dirile.
tgt_text: ngifuna ukuhalalisela bonke abafundi bethu bebanga lesi12 kanye nemindeni yabo ngesineke kanye nokuzinikela kwabo.

src_text: go totobetse jaanong gore baithuti ba tlhoka tshegetso e nngwe le e nngwe e ba ka e neelwang mme re tla tswelela go ba neela yona.
tgt_text: sekucace kwathi bha manje ukuthi ukwesekwa ngokwengeziwe kuyadingeka kulaba bafundi futhi sizoqhubeka sikuhlinzeke lokho.

src_text: go setse fela dikgwedi di le mmalwanyana gore ngwaga o ye bokhutlong mme lenaane la woza matrics le tla neela barutwana tshegetso e ba e tlhokang gore ba kgone go ipaakanyetsa ditlhatlhobo tsa bofelo jwangwaga," o tlhalositse jalo.
tgt_text: zincane kakhulu izinyanga ezisele manje ngaphambi kokuba kuphele lo nyaka futhi iwoza matrics izonika abafundi ukwesekwa abakudingayo ukuze balungiselele ukuvivinywa kwabo kokuphela konyaka," kusho yena.

src_text: lenaane leno ke motshwananosi gonne le totile baithuti ba mophato wa bo 12 ka bontsi ka fa nageng bao ka gale ba senanginthanete le didirisiwa tsa dijithale tse di dirisang inthanete.
tgt_text: lolu hlelo lwehlukile ngokuthi lubheke ikakhulu iningi lalabo bafundi bebanga lesi12 ezweni abangakwazi ukungena kuinthanethi manje namanje kanye nemishini yokuxhumana ngezobuchwepheshe bedijithali.

src_text: dikgaso tseno di tla kgona go bogelwa ke baithuti ka bontsi ba le dimilione di le 1.2 ba ba tla bong ba kwala ditlhatlhobo tsa bona tsa materiki mo kgweding ya ngwanaitseele.
tgt_text: izinhlelo zokusakaza zizotholakala ukuze zibukelwe yizigidi eziyi1.2 zabafundi ababhalela izivivinyo zabo zikamatikuletsheni ngolwezi.

src_text: lekgotla la thuto la ditona le ikuetse mo baithuting le mo batsading botlhe go sola serala seno mosola.
tgt_text: umkhandlu wongqongqoshe bezemfundo unxenxa bonke abafundi kanye nabazali ukuba basisebenzise lesi sizindalwazi.

src_text: mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (ceo) wa lekgotlakgaso la aforika borwa (sabc) madoda mxakwe a re lekgotlakgaso le motlotlo go nna le seabe mo letsholong leno.
tgt_text: umphathi oyinhloko kwasabc umadoda mxakwe uthi umsakazo uyaziqhenya ngokuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo.

src_text: "re motlotlo go bo re le yo mongwe wa batshamekakarolo ba ba botlhokwa mo go babaleleng ngwaga wa materiki wa 2020. re le tirelokgaso ya puso, go mo magetleng a rona go netefatsa gore mananeo a tirelokgaso a tsenyeletsa manaane a thuto a le mantsintsi, bogolo jang mo motsing ono o a tlhokagalang e le ruri.
tgt_text: "kuyasithokozisa ukuba yingxenye yababambiqhaza ababalulekile ekuvikeleni ukulahleka konyaka kamatikuletsheni wonyaka wezi2020.

src_text: "re araba dipotso tsa gagoke dirutwa dife tse di tla rutiwang?
tgt_text: njengomsakazo osiza umphakathi, sizibophezele emsebenzini ukuqinisekisa ukuthi okuqukethwe ngumsakazo kubandakanya izinto ezibalulekile ezinhlelweni zokufundisa, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi lapho kudingeka khona.

src_text: dinako tsa go ya sekolong ga di tshwane mo dikgaolong le mo diporofenseng tse di farologaneng ka ntlha ya maemo a go obamela melawana e e iletsang go atumelana.
tgt_text: kungani kuqokwe lezi zikhathi, ngoba abafundi kungenzeka babe sesikoleni?

src_text: barutwana ba materiki ka bontsi ba tla bo ba le kwa magaeng a bona fa mananeo ano a gasiwa.
tgt_text: izikhathi zokuya esikoleni ziyashiyana emikhandlwini kanye nasezifundazweni, ngenxa yokulandela izinyathelo zokuziqhelelanisa kubantu.

src_text: palo ya barutwana ba le mmalwanyana fela le bona ba kwadise ditswe go rutiwa ba le kwa magaeng a bona.
tgt_text: baningi abafundi bakamatiku letsheni abazobe besemakhaya ngesikhathi sokusakaza.

src_text: kgaso e kgolo e tla boelediwa morago ga ura ya bone maitseboa mo kanaleng ya openview le go tshamekiwa mo go dstv catchup .
tgt_text: lincane futhi iphesenti labafundi abafundela emakhaya.

src_text: goreng go rutiwa fela barutwana ba materiki?
tgt_text: ukusakazwa kwempela kuzophindwa emva kwehora lesi 4 ntambama kwiopenview futhi kuzophinde kutholakale kudstv catchup .

src_text: barutwana ba materiki ke bona ba leng ka fa tlase ga kgatelelo e e seng kana ka sepe ka ba tshwanetse go batlana gape le diphatlha tsa fa ba sena go konosetsa dithuto tsa bona.
tgt_text: kungani kuqokwe umatikuletsheni kuphela?

src_text: barutwana ba materiki ke bona ba kgoreletsegileng thata mo dithutong tsa bona fa e sale go tloga ka kgwedi ya mopitlwe 2020 ka ntlha ya gore kharikhulamo ya bona ga e a ke ya ngotliwa go tshwana le tse dingwe.
tgt_text: umatikuletsheni ungaphansi kwengcindezi yokuhlelela impilo yawo emva kokuqeda isikole.

src_text: barutwana ba materiki ke bona ba saletseng morago go gaisa mo dithutong tsa kharikhulamo ya bona.
tgt_text: umatikuletsheni uye wabhekana nokuphazamiseka kakhulu ekufundeni kwawo ukusuka ngondasa kowezi2020 ngenxa yokuthi uhlelo lokufunda kwawo aluzange lwafinyezwa.

src_text: nka fitlhela lenaneothulaganyo la mananeokgaso ano fa kae?
tgt_text: umatikuletsheni usasalele emuva kakhulu kuhlelo lwawo lokufunda.

src_text: lenaneothulaganyo la mananeokgaso ano le teng mo mananeothulaganyong a thelebišene mmogo le mo webesaeteng ya woza matrics ya wozamatrics.co.za.
tgt_text: ngingazithola kuphi izikhathi zokubuka?

src_text: mananeokgaso a a ipoeletsang le one a teng foo.
tgt_text: izikhathi zokubuka ziyatholakala kwimihlahlandlela kamabonakude kanye nakuwebhusayithi yewoza matrics ethi: wozamatrics.co.za .

src_text: a go na le tshegetso e e neelwang batsadi le barutabana?
tgt_text: izinhlelo zokusakaza eziphindayo zizotholakala.

src_text: ee e teng.
tgt_text: ngakube lokhu kwesekwa kuhlinzekelwe abazali kanye nothisha?

src_text: lenaneothulaganyo la mananeokgaso le tla bo le na le mananeo a go eletsa batsadi ka ditsela tse ba ka tshegetsang bana ba bona ba ba dirang materiki.
tgt_text: yebo.

src_text: mananeo a mangwe a tla tlhaba barutabana botlhale mme serala sa lefapha la thuto ya motheo sa go golagana le barutabana sa whatsapp se tla dirisiwa go romela melaetsa e e botlhokwa kwa barutabaneng.
tgt_text: lezi zikhathi zokusakaza zizoba nesikhathi lapho kunikwa khona abazali amasu ngezindlela zokuthi abazali bangamuseka kanjani umntwana owenza umatikuletsheni.

src_text: a go na le se se tla diriwang go samagana le kgatelelo ya mai kutlo e barutwana ba materiki ba leng mo go yona ga jaana ?
tgt_text: ezinye zalezi zikhathi zokusakaza zizogxila kothisha futhi inkundla yokuxhumana iwhatsapp yothisha bomnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo izothumela imilayezo ebalulekile kothisha.

src_text: ee se teng.
tgt_text: ngakube kuzokwenzeka yini ukuthi kugxilwe ekub hekaneni nobunzima obubhekene nomatikuletsheni?

src_text: go tla diriwa mananeo a le mmalwa a a tla tsepamisang mogopolo mo go tlhabeng barutwana botlhale gore ba tshele ka itekanelo jang, ba mekamekane jang le kgatelelo mo maikutlong mmogo le go etsaetsega.
tgt_text: yebo.

src_text: go bona tshedimosetso ka botlalo, etela webesaete ya woza matrics mo go wozamatrics.co.za kgotsa o romele imeile mo g o info@wozamatrics.co.za
tgt_text: kwethulwe ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lwewoza matrics dale hes uhlelo lwewoza matrics kuhloswe ngalo ukusiza bonke abafundi bebanga lesi12 ukuthi bakwazi ukuphumelela izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka.

src_text: bobegakgang jwa aforika borwa bo botlhokwa mo temokerasing ya rona vukuzenzele unnamed mo dinageng di le dintse go ralala le lefatshe, lerobo robo la mogare wa corona le dirile gore ditshwanelo di le dintsi di ilediwe mmogo le go gapeletsa gore batho e nne seoposengwe.
tgt_text: abezindaba baseningizimu afrika bayinsika yentando yeningi labantu vukuzenzele unnamed emazweni amaningi emhlabeni jikelele, ubhubhane lwegci wane lecorona lunciphise inkululeko yomphakathi lwaphinde lwalinga ubu mbano lomphakathi.

src_text: fela dinaga tse di nang le ditheo tse di nang le matla, thulaganyo ya bosiamisi e e etseng maemo tlhoko mmogo le bobegakgang jo bo sa etsae tsegeng di kgonne go thibela ditiragalo tse di gatakakang ditshwanelo tsa batho mmogo le tirisobotlhaswa ya matla a puso.
tgt_text: kodwa amazwe anezikhu ngo eziqinile, izinhlelo zobu lungiswa eziqaphile kanye nabezindaba abanamandla akwazile ukugwema ukuthi amalungelo abantu abukelwe phansi nokuhlukunyezwa kweziphathimandla zo mbuso.

src_text: jaanong re setse re na le dikgwedi di le thataro fa e sale go goelediwa gore naga e mo maemong a masetlapelo.
tgt_text: sekube yizinyanga ezi yisithupha selokhu kwame nyezelwa isimo senhlekelele kazwelonke.

src_text: ntle le seemo se se sa tlwaelegang sa go samagana le bolwetse jono mmogo le dikgwetlho tse dintsi tse di tsamaisanang le go baya naga ya batho ba le dimilione di le 58 ka fa tlase ga taolo ya go sekega nakwana ditiro tsa ka fa na geng, re kgabotse ka matsadi a se kae.
tgt_text: ngaphezu kwesimo esingakaze sibonwe sesifo kanye nezingqinamba zokubeka izwe elinabantu abayizigidi ezingama58 ngaphansi kokuvalwa kwe zwe, senze kahle kakhulu.

src_text: re kgonne go thibela go anama ga bolwetse jono segolobogolo ka ntlha ya gore re nnile le tirisanommogo le tlhokomelano mo baaging ba naga ya rona botlhe.
tgt_text: sikwazile ukunqanda uku bhebhetheka kwegciwane ikakhulukazi ngenxa yokuse benza ngokubambisana nokuqaphela kwazo zonke izakhamuzi.

src_text: eno tiro e tona tota mme re e kgonne ka ntlha ya tiro e e tswileng diatla e e dirilweng ke ditheo tsa rona tsa bobe gakgang.
tgt_text: lokhu akuyona into enca ne ngenxa yokusebenza ngokuzikhandla kwa bezindaba bakithi.

src_text: re leboga go menagane ba begadikgang ba naga ya rona ya aforika borwa ba ba seme letseng ka natla e bile ba sa nyeme mooko.
tgt_text: kumele sizibonge kakhulu izintatheli ezisebenza kanzi ma nangokuzimelela zase ningizimu afrika.

src_text: e ne e le bona ba kakatletse go sedimosetsa batho ba rona ka melaetsa e e botlhokwa ya dikgato tsa go tlhokomela boitekanelo jwa bona ka go katogana le go iphepafatsa.
tgt_text: bezilokhu zinikeza abantu bakithi ulwa zi ngokusabalalisa imiyalezo yezempilo yokuqhelelana kubantu kanye nenhlanzeko.

src_text: ba ne ba dira tiro eno ka fa tlase ga maemo a a neng a le bokete thata, mme go le gantsi ba ne ba e dira le fa ba ne ba tlhaela didirisiwa.
tgt_text: zikwenze lokho ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima, esikha thini esiningi nezinsizakuse benza zinganele.

src_text: ba ne ba gasa dinkgang tse di ka ga ditlamorago tsa go sekega nakwana ditiro tsa ka fa nageng mo matshelong a batho le mo dikgwebong tsa bona.
tgt_text: zisitshele ngezindaba zemiphumela yokuvalwa kwezwe ezimpilweni zabantu kanye nasemabhizinisini abo.

src_text: ba ne ba sasanka le metseselegae, diteropo le diteropokgolo, go kwala maitemogelo a batho le go supetsa naga matsapa a a leng teng kwa dipetlele le kwa ditleliniking, e leng seo se tlhotlheletsang gore puso e tsaye dikgato.
tgt_text: beziphumile ziye emakhaya, emadolobheni nasemado lobhenikazi, ziletha izindaba zabantu abajwayelekile futhi zidonsa amehlo esizwe ezinkingeni okubhekenwe nazo ezibhedlela nasemitho lampilo, zigqugquzela ukuthi uhulumeni asukume.

src_text: bobegakgang jwa rona gape bo phuntse sekaku seo tota fa e ne e le mo matsatsing a mo malobeng se neng se ka bo se itlhokomolositswe.
tgt_text: abezindaba bakithi basikha nyisele indlela ebesingeke siyibone nje.

src_text: bo tota bo diragaditse tiro ya jona ya go nna leitlho la setšhaba ka go utolola ditiragalo tsa bonweenwee le tsa tsamaiso e e sa lolamang, e leng seo se tlhotlhileng dikganetsano tse dikgolo tsa mo phasalatseng tsa ka fa nageng mme seo se dirile gore go rebolwe di phuruphutso mo bathong ba ba okameng maemo a a kwa godimo.
tgt_text: bayifezile indi ma yabo emphakathini ngokuvundulula izenzo zenkohlakalo nokunga phathi ngendlela, basusa inkulumompikiswano enku lu kuzwelonke ekuphenywe ni kwamacala asezingeni eliphezulu.

src_text: ka go bega dikgang tsa mothale ono bo kgonne go dira gore batho ba nne le tshepo mo go jona.
tgt_text: ngalokhu kubika kwabo sebezuze ukwethe njwa ngabantu.

src_text: go nna le bobegakgang jo bo sa gatelelweng ga go raye gore ke bokhutlho.
tgt_text: inkululeko yabezindaba ayi yona isiphetho.

src_text: ke tsela eo temokerasi e bonwang le go tsholediwa ka yona.
tgt_text: ingukugcina nokuphakamisa intando yeningi labantu.

src_text: mo pakeng ya leroborobo leno, bobegakgang jwa rona bo ne bo sa diragatse fela tiro ya jona ya go nna leitlho la setšhaba, bo ne gape go diragatsa tiro ya yona mo setšhabeng ka go tshegetsa matsapa a puso a go thibela go anama ga mogare wa corona .
tgt_text: ngesikhathi salolu bhubhane, abezindaba bakithi abadlalanga nje indima yabo emphakathini eyaziwayo, kodwa benze umsebenzi womphakathi ekwesekeni umzamo ka zwelonke wokunqanda igci wane lecorona .

src_text: re lebile seabe se bobega kgang bo nang le sona mo temokerasing ya rona, re tshwenyegile tota gore fela jaaka makala a mangwe a ikonomi ya rona, matsapa a a tlileng le mogare wa corona a amile ditlamo tsa rona tsa bobegakgang ka tsela e e sa jeseng diwelang.
tgt_text: ngenxa yokubaluleka kwabezindaba ekuphileni kwentando yeningi yethu, kukhathaza kakhulu ukuthi njengayo yonke eminye imikhakha yomnotho, inkinga yegciwane lecorona ihlasele kanzima abezindaba.

src_text: ditlamo tse dingwe tsa makwalodikgang di latlhegetswe ke 60% ya letseno mo matsatsing a fa re ne re le gone re tsena mo kgatong ya go sekega nakwa na ditiro tsa ka fa nageng.
tgt_text: ezinye izinkampani ezishicilelayo zilahlekelwe ingenisomali engamaphesenti angama60 ezinsukwini zokuqala zoku valwa kwezwe.

src_text: ditlamo di le dintsinyana di ne tsa gapeletsega gore di ngotle megolo ya badiredi ba tsona, go fokotsa badiri mo tirong kgotsa go fokotsa diura tseo ba di dirang.
tgt_text: izinkampani eziningi kwamele zinciphise amaholo, zinciphise inani labasebenzi noma zinciphise amahora asetshenzwayo.

src_text: ka bo madimabe ditlamo tse dingwe tsa makwalodikgang di ne tsa gapeletsega gore di tswalele, mme mo gare ga tsona di tsenyeletsa le ditlamo tse di tlotlegang tsa aforika borwa tse di phasalatsang dimaka sine tse di itsegeng thata.
tgt_text: okubuhlungu, ezinye izinkampani ezishicilelayo ziphoqeleke ukuthi zivalwe, phakathi kwazo nga maphephabhuku asungulwa kudala futhi aziwa kakhulu eningizimu afrika.

src_text: tatlhegelo ya ditiro e e tlho dilweng ke dikgato tsa go sekega nakwana ditiro tsa ka fa nageng e tlhotlheleditse mathata ano mo ditlamong tsa bobegakgang tse di neng di setse di tobane le dikgwetlho tsa go tshwana le tsa go latlhe gelwa ke letseno leo ba neng ba le dira ka dipapatso, dikgwe tlho tsa go fokotsega ga go re kisiwa ga makwalodikgang le go tseelwa bareki ke ditlamo tse di rekisang dikgang ka megala ya mo seatleng le ka didirisiwa tse dingwe gape tsa thekenoloji.
tgt_text: ukulahleka kwemisebenzi okubangelwe ukuvalwa kwezwe sekwandise inkinga yezinkampani zabezindaba ezivele zibhekene nezi nselele ezifana nezimali zokukhangisa, ukusatsha laliswa kwephephandaba kanye nesabelo semakethe esesihlwithwe izindaba ezikhishwa ngomakhale khukhwini nangobunye ubuchwepheshe.

src_text: dikgwetlho tsa matlole tseno go tobanwe le tsona mo lephateng leno lotlhe, mo ditlamong tsa dikgatiso tsa mo inthaneteng go tsenyeletsa ditlamo tse di gatisang makwalodikgang ka mokgwa o o tlwaelegileng mmogo le mo ditheong tsa kgaso tsa setšhaba.
tgt_text: lezi zingqi namba zemali zihlasele yonke indawo, kusuka kuzindaba zakuinthanethi kuya kulwa zi olubhalwe ephepheni kuya kubasakazi.

src_text: eno ke e nngwe ya dintlha tse di atlhaatlhilweng ka tsenelelo mo ditherisanong tsa me le mokgatlo wa naga wa barulaganyi ba dikgatiso ba aforika borwa.
tgt_text: lolu olunye lodaba olwa phakanyiswa ngesikhathi sezingxoxo zami zakamuva nje nenkundla kazwelonke yaseningizimu afrika yabahleli isouth african national editors’ forum.

src_text: go na le go itatswa matsadi, intaseteri ya bobegakgang e semeletse mo go kwaloleng sešwa me kgwataolo ya dikgwebo, go tlhotlheletsa boitshimololedi le go leka ka natla ka moo ba ka kgonang go boloka ditiro tsa badiredi ba bona.
tgt_text: esikhundleni sokubalisa ngekusasa labo, kunalokho, imboni yabezindaba isebenza kanzima ukuhlela kabusha ibhizinisi, ukuza nezindlela ezintsha kanye nokugcina abasebenzi ngayo yonke indlela.

src_text: le fa go le jalo, ka mo letlhakoreng le lengwe bobegakgang ke setheo se se itlhophileng mo setšhabeng se sengwe le se sengwe ka ntlha ya gore batlhankedi ba jone ba dira tiro e e botlhokwa thata mo temokerasing ya rona.
tgt_text: ngaso leso sikhathi, abezindaba bayibhizinisi elehlukile kunoma imuphi umphakathi ngenxa yokuthi abasebenza kulona bafezekisa indima ebaluleke kakhulu kwintando yeningi labantu.

src_text: ba leka ka natla go netefatsa gore setšhaba se nna mo dinakong ka seo se diragalang mmogo le go netefatsa gore bao ba filweng maatla ba se a dirise boatla.
tgt_text: basebenza ukugcina umpha kathi unolwazi nokugcina abaphethe emgqeni.

src_text: re tlhoka go nna le babe gadikgang ba bangwe ba le bantsi, e seng ba ba fokotse gileng.
tgt_text: sidinga izintatheli eziningi, hhayi ezimbalwa.

src_text: ke ka ntlha ya seo go latlhegelwa le ke mmegadi kgang a le mongwenyana fela e seng fela tatlhegelo mo intase tering eno mme e le tatlhe gelo le mo nageng yotlhe.
tgt_text: yingakho nje ukulahlekelwa ngisho yi ntatheli eyodwa kungalahle kelwa imboni kuphela kodwa silahlekelwa njengezwe.

src_text: re tlhoka botlhogoputswa ba rona, ba ba nang le maite mogelo a magolo le kitso e e tseneletseng ya ka fao ditheo di dirang ka gone, mme e bile ba kgona go sekaseka dikgang ka tsenelelo e bile ba atlhaatlha dintlha ba na le tshedimosetso e e tletseng.
tgt_text: sidinga omakadebona bezintatheli bakithi, aba zoletha isipiliyoni kanye nezikhumbuzo zabezindaba, futhi abazokwazi ukuletha imibiko ebucayi nenolwazi.

src_text: le fa go le jalo, re tlhoka gape le babegadikgang ba ba santseng ba le bannye mo tirong eno ba ba nang le kitso e ntsi ka didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji, ba ba nang le kitso e e tletseng ka mekgwa e mentšhwa ya go bega di kgang e bile ba na le kitso e e tletseng ka ga dingongorego tsa bašwa.
tgt_text: ngaso leso sikhathi sidinga izintatheli eziningi ezisenca ne ezazi ezobuchwepheshe, ezihambisana nezindlela ezintsha zokuxoxa izindaba futhi ezixhumene nezinkinga ezibhekene nentsha.

src_text: re le baagi re tlhoka go tshegetsa bobegakgang ka botlalo.
tgt_text: njengomphakathi kumele seseke ngokuphelele abezindaba.

src_text: e ka tswa e le ka go duelela mananeo ao ba a gasang, go duelela madi a go tshegetsa babegadikgang, ka go duelela dilaesense tsa rona tsa sabc kgotsa ka go reka makwalodikgang, re ka tshameka karolo ya rona go inola intaseteri eno mo matsapeng a e leng ka fa teng ga ona.
tgt_text: noma ngabe kumele sikhethe ukuthi si khokhele okuqukethwe izindaba, ukusekela izinta theli ezixhaswe ngeminikelo yomphakathi, ukukhokhela amalayisensi akwasabc noma nje ngokuthenga iphe phandaba, sonke singadlala indima yethu ukwesekela le mboni esenkingeni.

src_text: re le puso, le fa tota re aparetswe ke leru le letsho mo ikonoming ya rona, re tla tswelela go duelela dipapatso mo makwalodikganyeng le mo mananeokgasong, bo golojang mo diyalemoweng tsa baagi.
tgt_text: njengo hulumeni, ngaphezu kwesimo somnotho ontengantengayo sizoqhubeka nokukhangisa kulabo abashicilelayo na basakazayo, ikakhulukazi abezindaba basemphakathini.

src_text: lekala la poraefete le lona le tshwanelwa ke go tswelela go tshegetsa intaseteri eno ka go duelela dipapatso mmogo le go dirisanammogo le ditlamo tsa bobegakgang mo go tlha giseng mananeo a mantšhwa a a tsamaelanang le maemo a bobegakgang mo lefatsheng.
tgt_text: umkhakha ozimele kumele nawo uqhubeke nokweseka le mboni ngokukhangisa kanye nokusebenzisana nabezinda ba ekukhiqizeni izindaba ezi ntsha ezisezingeni lomhlaba.

src_text: mekgatlho ya ka fa nageng e e tlamelang ka matlole le yona e tshwanetse go tsaya karolo ka go tshegetsa bobegakgang jo bo tswelang baagi mosola, jaaka go ntse mo dinageng tse dintsi tse di busiwang ka temokerasi.
tgt_text: labo abanesihe balapha ekhaya kanye nezinhlangano ezinikelayo kumele nabo bangenelele basekele amabhi zinisi abezindaba, njengoba kunjalo kwintando yeningi labantu.

src_text: koketsego ya dikgang tsa maaka mo pakeng ya lerobo robo leno, bogolo jang mo diraleng tsa mafaratlhatlha a ditlhaeletsano, di tlhodile gore go nne le tlhokego e kgolo ya dikgang tsa boammaruri, tse di sa tseeng letlhakore e bile di sa emelele ope.
tgt_text: ukwanda kwezindaba ezi ngelona iqiniso ngesikhathi sobhubhane, ikakhulukazi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kwengeze isidingo esiphuthu mayo sezindaba eziningi ezinembayo, ezilungile futhi ezingathathi cala.

src_text: mo nakong eno batho ba rona ba ne ba itshepetse mo ditlamong tse di itsegeng tsa bobegakgang gore ba bone tshedimosetso e e tshepagalang, e leng seo gape se supang botlhokwa jwa bone mo temokerasing ya rona.
tgt_text: ngalesi sikhathi abantu bakithi bathembele kwabezindaba ngolwazi, futhi sibukela phansi ukubaluleka kwabo njengezinsika zentando yeningi labantu.

src_text: jaaka re simolola tiro e e tona ya go aga sešwa ikonomi ya rona go latela ditlamorago tsa leroborobo leno, intaseteri ya bobegakgang e tla tlhoka tshegetso ya rona go feta mo malobeng.
tgt_text: njengoba siqala umsebenzi omkhulu wokwakha kabu sha umnotho wethu emva kwemiphumela yobhubhane, imboni yabezindaba izodinga ukuthi siyisekele kakhulu kunakuqala.

src_text: bobegakgang jwa makwalodikgang jo bo golo legileng bo ne bo tlhalosiwa e le 'modisi yo a sa robaleng wa ditshwanelo tsotlhe tse monna le mosadi yo a gololegileng a di tlotlomatsang'.
tgt_text: inkululeko ya bezindaba yake yachazwa 'njengomnakekeli ongalali walolonke ilungelo elikhulula amadoda nabesifazane'.

src_text: jaaka re tlotla seabe sa jone mo lerobo robong leno, tla re direng tsotlhe tse re ka di kgonang go netefatsa gore bobegakgang jo bo gololegileng le jo bo farolo ganeng mo nageng ya rona bo kgona go supoga mo dinaleng tseno tsa phage le go atlega.
tgt_text: abezindaba baseningizimu afrika bayinsika yentando yeningi labantu vukuzenzele unnamed emazweni amaningi emhlabeni jikelele, ubhubhane lwegci wane lecorona lunciphise inkululeko yomphakathi lwaphinde lwalinga ubu mbano lomphakathi.

src_text: go fetola lephata la temothuo vukuzenzele unnamed lefapha la temo thuo, ntšhwafa tso ya mafatshe le tlhabololo ya magae (dlrd le itsisitse bosheng jaana gore maloko a setšhaba ba tla kgona go dira dikopo tsa go hira diheketara di le 700 000 tsa lefatshe la puso le le sa dirisiweng kgotsa le le lolea mo diporofenseng di le supa.
tgt_text: ukuguqula umkhakha wezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kamuva nje, umnyango wezolimo, ukuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya (idlrd) wamemezela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi azokwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuqasha umhlaba wombuso ongamahe ktha ayizi700 000 ongasetshenziswa noma ohleli nje ezifundazweni eziyisikhombisa.

src_text: lefatshe la temothuo ke pi lara ya motheo wa motswedi wa tlhago wa rona.
tgt_text: ezolimo ziyinsika yesisekelo sokumbiwa phansi kwe mvelo.

src_text: go nna gona le tiriso e e tswelelang ya lefatshe la temo go jala le ka leruo ke ntlha e e botlhokwa ya matshelo a rona.
tgt_text: ukuba khona nokuse tshenziswa okusimeme kwendawo yokulima izitshalo nokufuya izilwane sizonqoba ngakho.

src_text: aforika borwa e na le karolo e kgolo ya lefatshe le leng maleba go tlhagiso ya temothuo, ka 37,9% ya palogotlhe ya lefatshe e dirisetswang kgwebo ka temothuo.
tgt_text: iningizimu afrika inomhlaba omningi kakhulu olungele umkhiqizo wezolimo, ama37.9% omhlaba wethu wonke njengamanje usetshenziselwa ezolimo ukuze kuthengiswe.

src_text: jaaka bontsi jwa dinaga tse dingwe, lefatshe la rona le le siametseng temo le ka fa tlase ga matshosetsi a tshenyego le tatlhegelo ya bokgoni go ka lengwa, tlhaelo ya metsi le patiko ya setoropo.
tgt_text: njengamanye amazwe, umhlaba wethu ovundile usengcupheni yokuncipha kokuvunda, ukungabi namanzi ngokwanele kanye nokusetshenziswa komhlaba ukwakha kuwona.

src_text: gape re latlhegelwa ke lefatshe la temo ka ntlha ya diphetogo go tiriso ya lefatshe.
tgt_text: siphinde silahlekelwe umhlaba wokulima omkhulu kakhulu ngenxa yezinguquko ekusetshe nzisweni komhlaba.

src_text: fa re lebelela hisetori ya rona, go atolosiwa ga phitlhelelo go lefatshe la temothuo go kgwebo le temo e e tswelelang ke ntlhakgolo ya bosetšhaba.
tgt_text: uma sibheka umlando wethu, ukunweba ukufinyelela emhlabeni wokulima imikhiqizo ezothengiswa nokulimela ukuziphilisa kuyinto eseqhulwini kuzwelonke.

src_text: le fa tsamaiso ya ntšhwafatso ya lefatshe ya morago ga 1994 e bakile bontsi jwa lefatshe go baakanngwa le go busediwa bantsho ba maaforikaborwa, ditlamorago tsa bopelomaswe jwa molao wa lefatshe la bathobantsho wa 1913 di tswelela go nna mo dipateroneng tsa beng lefatshe la temo.
tgt_text: yize uhlelo lokuguqulwa komhlaba lwangasemva kowe1994 luholele ekubu yisweni komhlaba omningi wabuyiselwa kubantu aba nsundu baseningizimu afrika, umphumela oyingozi womthetho wangowe1913 womhlaba wabomdabu uyaqhubeka nokubonakala ebunikazini bomhlaba wokulima.

src_text: molao o ka kwa go amoga dimilione tsa batho lefatshe la borrabonamogolo.
tgt_text: lo mthetho waqhubeka na ngaphezu kokuphuca izigidi zabantu umhlaba wokhokho babo.

src_text: jaaka benglefatshe bo santse bo le mo diatleng tsa ba le mmalwa,tlhagiso ya motheo ya temothuo le ditirelo tsa metseletsele ya dikuno tseo beng e leng basweu, diabe tsa rona tsa maloba di santse di na le rona le gompieno.
tgt_text: njengoba ubunikazi bomhlaba busesezandleni zabayidlanzana, nokukhiqizwa kwezolimo okukhulu nemisebenzi ehambisana nokukhiqizwa iphethwe ngabalimi abamhlo phe, imiphumela ye sikhathi sethu esedlule isalokhu inathi namuhla.

src_text: taolo e e tsweletseng ya ntlhakgolo ya tlhagiso jaaka lefatshe ga se sekgoreletsi fela go tswelediso setšhaba se se gololosegileng; ke resepe ya khuduego ya loago.
tgt_text: ukuqhubeka nokubusa wedwa emikhiqizweni eba lulekile njengomhlaba akusiso nje isithikamezo ekwenzeni ngcono umphakathi oli nganayo; kuzodala inxu shunxushu emphakathini.

src_text: keletso e e tseneletseng ya go bona lefatshe go lema e a gola, bogolosegolo gareng ga magae a a humanegileng.
tgt_text: ukulambela umhlaba wokulima kuyakhula, ikakhulukazi kulabo abadla imbuya ngothi emakhaya.

src_text: mme ka mabaka a le mmalwa, sekgala sa ntšhwafatso ya lefatshe bogolosegolo mo lephateng leno e ntse e le bonya ebile e sa kgotsofatse.
tgt_text: ngezizathu eziningi, ukuguqulwa ko mhlaba kulo mkhakha ku hamba ngonyawo lonwabu futhi akugculisi.

src_text: go fetola dipaterone tsa go nna mong wa lefatshe la temo go botlhokwa go samagana le tshokelelo ya paka e e fetileng, fela go sireletsa go nna gona ga dijo go setšhaba sa rona.
tgt_text: ukuguqula ukuphathwa kobunikazi bomhlaba wokulima kubaluleke kakhulu hhayi nje ukuze kubhekanwe no mlando ongenabulungiswa, kodwa ukuze sivikele ukuphepha kokudla kwesizwe sethu.

src_text: jaaka go etswe tlhoko ka pegelo ya 2019 ya phanele ya bogakolodi ya moporesidente ka ga ntšhwafatso ya lefatshe le temothuo, "le fa tota re romelantle dijo, fa gae 41% ya batho kwa dikgaolong tsa selegae le 59,4% kwa dik gaolong tsa toropo ga ba fitlhelele tse di lekaneng."
tgt_text: njengoba kubekiwe embi kweni wangowezi2019 wesi gungu eseluleka umongameli ngokuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nezolimo, "ngesikhathi thina sithumela ukudla kwamanye amazwe, emuva ekhaya abantu abangama41% ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nabangama59.4% emadolobheni abafinyeleli ngokwanele ekudleni."

src_text: phetolo ya temothuo e ntse e le ntlha e e kwa godimo ya batsamaisi ba ba latelanang e sale temokerasi.
tgt_text: ukuguqulwa kwezolimo bekulokhu kuseqhulwini kubaphathi abalandelanayo kusukela kwintando yeningi labantu.

src_text: magareng ga 1994 le mopitlwe 2018 puso e neetse ka diheketara di le dimilione di le 8,4 tsa lefatshe go bang bao mo malobeng ba neng ba tlhokomologilwe ka fa tlase ga lenaneo la ntšhwafatso ya lefatshe.
tgt_text: phakathi kowe1994 nondasa kowezi2018 uhulu meni unikeze amahektha omhlaba ayizigidi eziyisi8.4 kubantu abebencishwe amathuba ngaphansi kohlelo lokuguqulwa komhlaba.

src_text: fela tswelopele eno e dira fela diperesente tse di kwa tlase ga 10 ya kgwebo ya temothuo.
tgt_text: kodwa le nqubekelapha mbili ilingana nokungaphansi kwe10% komhlaba ophelele wokulima.

src_text: mo puong ya maemo a setšhaba go sale gale mono ngwaga ke itlamile gore le fatshe la temothuo leo eleng la puso le tla gololwa go dirisetswa temo.
tgt_text: enkulumweni yami yesimo sezwe ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka ngazibophezela ukuthi umhlaba wokulima ongapha nsi kukahulumeni uzodede lwa maduze ukuze kulinywe.

src_text: seno ke kgato e kgolo go tsamaiso ya phetolo ya temothuo, le go diragatsa tsholofetso ya tšhata ya kgololosego ya gore lefatshe le tla arolelanwa magareng ga bao ba le dirisang.
tgt_text: lokhu kuyingqophamla ndo ohlelweni lokuguqulwa kwezolimo, futhi lugcina isithembiso esikusomqulu wenkululeko esithi umhlaba kuzokwabelwana ngawo kulabo abasebenza kuwona.

src_text: pono ya rona ya neelo e ikaelela go dira maleka magareng ga bosiamisi jwa loago le paakanyo, le go oketsa tlhagiso ya temothuo ka go lere bontsi jwa balemi ba batho bantsho go ikonomi ya bogareng.
tgt_text: umbono wethu wokuphi nde kwabiwe umhlaba uhlose ukulinganisa phakathi kobulungiswa kwezenhlalo noku lungisa, nokukhulisa imi khiqizo yezolimo ngokuletha abalimi abansundu abaningi emnothweni omkhulu.

src_text: lefatshe ke letlotlo le le nang le kuno eo e dirang morokotso mme le ka dirisiwa jaaka sethusi go bona matlotlo a mangwe.
tgt_text: umhlaba uyifa eliletha inzuzo futhi ungasetshenzi swa njengesibambiso ukuzu za elinye ifa.

src_text: re tshwanetse go netefatsa gore lefatshe le le bonweng ka maikalelo a go lema le dirisiwa sentle.
tgt_text: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi umhlaba odingekayo ukuze kulinywe usetshenziswa ngendlela enenzuzo.

src_text: go sireletsa lefatshe le le neetsweng ke puso ka maikaelelo a go lema, ga go na tetla go fetisetsa khiro go yo mongwe.
tgt_text: ukuze siqaphe umhlaba onikeziwe kahulumeni ukuze kuli nywe kuwona, isivumelwano sokuwuqasha asidluliseleki komunye umuntu.

src_text: baamogeladitshwanelo ba tla saena tumelano ya khiriso le puso le go duela tlhotlhwa ya go renta e e tsamaisanang le boleng jwa lefatshe.
tgt_text: abazu zile bazosayina isivumelwano sokuqasha nohulumeni bese bekhokha imali yokuqasha elingana nenani lomhlaba.

src_text: re tshwanetse gape go netefatsa gore balemi ba a tshege diwa mo leetong la tsweletso le morokotso.
tgt_text: kumele futhi siqinisekise ukuthi abalimi bayasekelwa baze basimame futhi benze inzuzo.

src_text: jaaka karolo ya lenaneo leno, baamogeladitshwanelo ba tla bona katiso go tsamaiso ya ditšhelete le tlhabololo ya kgwebo.
tgt_text: njengengxenye yalolu hlelo, abazuzile bazoqeqeshwa ngokulawula izimali kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi.

src_text: maitemogelo a bontshitse gore balemi ba ba tlhagelelang ba tlhaela dikgono go ditšhelete le go dirisa ditšhono tsa mmaraka le go tsenyeletsa metseletsele ya dikuno.
tgt_text: isikhathi esidlule sibonise ukuthi abalimi abasafufusa nabasebancane ba jwayele ukuswela amakhono kwezezimali ukubhekana namathuba ezimakethe kanye nokuzihlanganisa nokwenziwa kwemikhiqizo.

src_text: basadi, bašwa le batho ba ba nang le dikgwetlho tsa mmele ke bona ba ba leng kwa godimo mo lenaneong la baamogeladitshwanelo.
tgt_text: sibeke eqhulwini abesifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka njengabantu abazozuza.

src_text: go nnile le katlego e e bonalang ka go matlafatsa balemi ba basadi ka fa tlase ga togamaano e e malalaotswe go phitlhelelo ya lefatshe (plas).
tgt_text: sekube nempumelelo ebonakalayo ngokuhlomisa abalimi besifazane ngaphansi kwesu lokutholwa komhlaba ipro active land acquisition strategy (iplas).

src_text: go palo ya diporofense, basadi bao ba neng ba neetswe dipolase ke dlrd ba kgonne go di tsamaisa ka katlego le go fetela kwa tlhagisong ya kgwebo.
tgt_text: ezifundazweni eziningi, abesifazane asebenikwe amapulazi yidlrd bakwazile ukuwaqhuba ngempumelelo futhi sebedlulele ekukhiqizeni imikhiqizo ethengiswayo.

src_text: mo godimo ga go bona lefatshe, lefapha le tswelela go beeletsa go ma faratlhatlha, didiriswa le metšhini go kgontsha bagwebi bano go tsamaisa dikgwebo tse di atlegileng.
tgt_text: ukwengeza ekutholweni komhlaba ngokwawo, u mnyango uyaqhubeka no kutshala izimali kwingqala sizinda, izinsizakusebenza nemishini ukuze labo somabhizinisi abancane bezokwazi ukuqhuba amabhizinisi aphumelelayo.

src_text: go oketsa phitlhelelo ya lefatshe le ditšhono tsa go lema go tla tshegetsa go tlhamiwa ga ditiro ka go godisa losika le le ntšhwa la balemi le tlhabololo ya kgwebo, le go tokafatsa mmaraka wa dijo, dithoto tsa temothuo le ditirelo.
tgt_text: ukusabalalisa ukufinyelela emhlabeni nasemathubeni okulima kuzosekela ukusu ngulwa kwemisebenzi kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwama bhizinisi, futhi kuthuthukisa imakethe yokudla, izimpahla zolimo kanye nezinsiza.

src_text: maikaelelo a a botlhokwa a go golola diphasele tseno tsa lefatshe ke go fetola selebego sa temothuo ka go godisa losika le le ntšhwa la balemi.
tgt_text: inhloso enkulu yokudedela lezi ziqephu zomhlaba ngukuguqula isimo sezolimo ngokukhulisa isizukulwane esisha sabalimi.

src_text: go hirisa lefatshe ka fa tlase ga maemo a a siameng jaana go tshwanetse go ba thusa go nagana; eseng fela go godisa dikgwebo tsa bona fela go tsweledisa khumo e e arole lwanang le katlego go baagi bao ba lemang gona.
tgt_text: ukuqasha umhlaba ngaphansi kwezimo ezivunayo kumele kubenze bacabange okukhulu; hhayi nje ukukhulisa amabhizinisi abo kodwa ukwenza ngcono ingcebo okwabelwana ngayo kanye nokuchuma emiphakathini abalima kuyona.

src_text: ba tshwanetse go fodisa dikarogano tse di tseneletseng tsa rona tsa nako e e fetileng.
tgt_text: kumele bapholise ama nxeba obandlululo lwesikhathi sethu esedlule.

src_text: ba tshwanetse go ntsha tumelo e e rileng ya gore ke balemi ba batho basweu fela bao ba atlegileng mo kgwebong mo aforika borwa, le gore balemi ba bathobantsho ka nako tso tlhe ‘ke ba ba tlhagelelang’.
tgt_text: kumele bayichithe inkolelo ethi abalimi abamhlophe kuphela abaphumelelayo ekuthengiseni eningizimu afrika, nokuthi abalimi aba nsundu bahlale 'befufusa.

src_text: mo go diriseng lefatshe leno; go le fetolela tiriso ya tlhagiso, e le ruri ba tla fetola marumo go nna megoma.
tgt_text: 'ekusebenzeni lo mhlaba; ukuwusebenzisela ukukhiqiza, nakanjani bazophendula izinkemba zibe ngamageja.

src_text: e tla nna dikai tsa poelano ya setšhaba.
tgt_text: ukuguqula umkhakha wezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kamuva nje, umnyango wezolimo, ukuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya (idlrd) wamemezela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi azokwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuqasha umhlaba wombuso ongamahe ktha ayizi700 000 ongasetshenziswa noma ohleli nje ezifundazweni eziyisikhombisa.

src_text: go tsosolosa ikonomi e e re tswelang mosola vukuzenzele unnamed go thankgololwa ga letsholo la madi tshegetso a go tlhola ditiro la moporesitente mo bekeng e e fetileng ke sesupo se segolo mo dikgatong tsa rona tsa go samagana le botlhokatiro.
tgt_text: sivuselela umnotho osebenzayo vukuzenzele unnamed ukwethulwa komzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi ngesonto eledlule kuwuphawu lomnyakazo oyisisekelo ekubhe kaneni kwethu noku swelakala kwemisebe nzi.

src_text: re samagana le dipeeletso tse dikgolo tse di mosola tota tsa setšhaba tsa go beeletsa matlole mo bathong, mo puso e leng yona e tsayang dikgato tsa go kgontsha gore go nne le ditiro e bile gape e le yona e e tlholang ditiro.
tgt_text: sithatha igxathu elifinyelela kude nelivelele lokutshala izimali zikahulumeni kuba ntu, ngokuthi uhulumeni abe ngumsunguli futhi abe ngumhlinzeki wemisebe nzi.

src_text: letsholo la maditshegetso a go tlhola ditiro la moporesitente ka bogolo jwa lona ga le ise le ke le diragadiwe fa e sale, moo le tsenyeletsang dipeeletso tsa puso tsa bokanaka r100 bilione mo dingwageng di le tharo tse di tlang.
tgt_text: umzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi uyingqayizivele ngobubanzi bawo, ubandakanya utshalomali lukahulumeni oluyizigi digidi eziyir100 eminyakeni emithathu ezayo.
